page.description: Set the scanner back to the beggining.
page.discussion: The <StringScanner>.Reset() function moves the offset to the beginning of the buffer (position = 1).
page.example: dim scanner as P dim txt as C txt = <<%text% This is wonderful text written by a great writer %text% ? txt = This is wonderful text written by a great writer scanner = stringscanner.create(txt) scanner.scanover(10) ? scanner.getremainder() = nderful text written by a great writer scanner.reset() ? scanner.getremainder() = This is wonderful text written by a great writer
